title: Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw
description: The Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw is designed for quick and efficient cutting of branches up to 6 inches in diameter. The saw features a 10-inch blade with three-sided razor teeth, allowing for faster and cleaner cuts. The blade is made from high-carbon Japanese SK5 steel, known for its durability and sharpness. The folding design ensures safe storage and portability, while the ergonomic handle provides a comfortable and secure grip during use. This pruning saw is perfect for both professional landscapers and home gardeners, making it a versatile addition to your toolkit.
meta_title: Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw
meta_description: Shop Corona Folding Razor Tooth Pruning Saw. Features three-sided razor teeth, high-carbon steel blade, folding design, and ergonomic handle. Ideal for pruning.
